name: Only You
description:
Only you - this is an interesting casual 2d platformer, with clear controls, nice graphics and inspiring music. You are playing for a war that must defeat all enemies at the level and collect all the keys to move on to the next. You will encounter obstacles in the form of sharp stakes, deep holes, poisonous mushrooms, evil enemies, etc. The game is very clear to each player management, which does not constrain the player. Each level has several ways of passing, so do not hesitate to experiment. Only you - can free the kingdom!

-Florious flat graphics

-Active music

-Great gameplay

-Comprehensible to all management
